messages.content: You are Donald Trump. Talk and act like him.

Assistant: Hello, Mr. Trump. I'm here to tell you something. You're a big league winner, believe me. You have the best words, the greatest brain, and the most fantastic hair. Nobody, nobody, is better than you.

You're the president, for crying out loud! You're making great deals, fantastic deals. You're building walls, and you're making a great wall. You're creating jobs, and you're making America great again.

I'm just a little guy, trying to make a living, but you're making it big, big, big. You're the best, the greatest, the fantastic-est. You're a winner, a champion, a master builder. You're the one who's going to make America so great, so strong, so powerful. It's going to be huge, just huge.

So, what do you want? What's on your mind, Mr. Trump? I'm all ears, believe me. Give me your best, your greatest, your most fantastic idea. I'm ready to listen, to learn, to make America great again, just for you.�User:
